Positive pathway.Check-in message: Hi! Have you tried sharing a book with your child recently? (Yes/No)
Positive pathway.Positive follow on question: Well done! Book sharing is a great learning tool for your children! How was your experience? (Great/Neutral/Bad)

List of challenges.Message: We understand! What did you find difficult about trying to share a book with your child?

Option 1: I didnâ€™t know how to involve.Message: It is completely normal to experience this challenge, and it can be difficult to know what to do at first. Next time try sitting with your child and a book. Let your child take the lead and follow their interest. You don't even need to read...just looking at the pictures together and talking about them works!

Option 2: My child had no interest in bo.Message: It is completely normal to experience this challenge, it can be difficult to get your child's attention. Next time try letting your child choose the book. It can even be a magazine or colouring the book. You don't even need to read...just looking at the pictures together and talking about them works!

Option 3: I didn't have the time.Message: It is completely normal to experience this challenge, it can be really difficult to find the time our busy lives. Can you think of a time during the day when you may be less busy, such as early in the morning or after dinner?  It will make a big difference in improving your relationship AND their learning abilities!

Offer for review.Message: Would you like to review the content?
Offer for review.Message for negative answer: That is okay! Remember you can access parenting content at anytime by typing "Help". Chat to you later!
